GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v6.0.2
GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix crash in beacon protection for P2P-device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.2 by commit 8ed62f2df8ebcf79c185f1bc3e4f346ea0905da6, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 9eaf183af741e3d8393eb571ac8aec9ee7d6530e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: mac80211: fix crash in beacon protection for P2P-device
